changelog:
If you encounter any issues, please report them in github issues or in our discord server


Small release to fix problems with some boorus and add some QoL features and changes


New Features:
- Added a button to viewer toolbar to select/deselect current item
- Added a setting to change preload size limit (can be found in Settings->Viewer, 200mb by default)


Changes:
- App will now remember last used backup folder
- Long tap on playback speed button will reset the speed
- Mute button will now be colored if global mute is enabled
- Search can be restarted by tapping on the message on the bottom if it takes too long or seems stuck


Fixes:
- Fixed performance issues related to avif image decoding (mostly related to sankaku)
- Fixed idol sankaku auth logic
- Fixed comments on gelbooru
- Fixed comments not loading on r34xxx if there are only one comment (may prompt you to complete captcha)
- Fixed search on r34xyz/world if there are multiple tags in the query
- Fixed items being sent to snatch queue twice when both 'Snatch on fav' and 'Fav on snatching' settings are enabled
- Fixed download notifications spamming on every download, instead of at the end of each batch
- Fixed text and icon colors on some buttons


and other small fixes and changes...


Known Issues:
- avif animated images may start animating even when gif thumbnails are disabled
